Articles.Content:
Nope.

The user below me has never seen me before out of the forum games forum.

True that, true that.

The user below me has a functional firearm.

Nope!

The user below me has a gun

No, unless you count a giant potato cannon.

The user below me joined in 2013.

One year behind ya.

The user below me has a Playstation 4 or an XBOX One. (I would call them the PCMR names, but I think the mods wouldn't like that.)

Nope. I casually game on my phone and seriously game on my PC (masterrace, etc etc).

The user below me kissed someone at midnight on New Year's Eve.

Nope, not mature enough.

The user below me is a human.

I am a human.[citation needed]

The next poster knows how to program, at least a little bit, in at least *one* programming language.

Sort of in Javascript.

The user below me is using a laptop to post.

Edited January 2, 2015 by Sesni
derp

False, I'm using a tablet.

The user below has flown a spaceplane that failed to get into a stable orbit.

True. But I've also flown successful spaceplanes.

The user below likes apples.

Not a big fan of them personally.

The user below me likes War Thunder

Not that much

The user below me is TARS from interstellar

No.

The user below me has a pet.

yes, fish!

The user below me lives in America.

Which one? North or South?

The user below me likes using 'America' better than 'the United States of America'

False, the correct terminology is 'Murica.

The user below me likes brie.

What is brie?

The user below me has crashed on Tylo. In KSP of course.

Oh yes, my first visit there I drastically underestimated the required TWR (I think I had around 1.4 Tylo-relative) and waited too late to start my aptly-named suicide burn. It's still a a challenge f my modest piloting skills to do an efficient landing even now.

The user below me shoveled snow this year. *Shakes fist at winter*

You had snow??? Lucky... One of the many downsides to England is no snow whatsoever in any measurable amount.

The user below me has gone on #kspofficial IRC chat.

A lot, according to the Rokkergram:

The user below me has never used IRC.

what is irc?

The user below me has eaten beetroot in their lives.

nope.

the user below me is dead and not dead at the same time.

Sorry, I'm not Schrodinger's Cat.

The user below me posted on a phone.

I don't have a phone (yet)

The user below me is an Anglophone.
